params._contractAddress: address The address of the ERC721 contract
address The address of the ERC721 contract
params._currencyAddress: address The address of the currency
params._numMints: uint8 The number of tokens to be minted
params._proof: bytes32[] The merkle proof for the allowlist if applicable, otherwise empty array

params._contractAddress: address The address of the ERC721 contract
params._currencyAddress: address The address of the currency to accept
params._maxMints: uint256 The max number of tokens to mint per transaction
params._price: uint256 The price to mint each token
params._splitRatios: uint8[] The ratios to split the sale with
params._splitRecipients: address payable[] The addresses to split the sale with

getDirectSaleConfig(address).notice: Gets the direct sale config for a contract

mintDirectSale(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Mints a token to the buyer

prepareMintDirectSale(address,address,ui.notice: Prepares a minting contract for direct sales
